World.name: Aftermath of Ashes
World.description: A desolate world ravaged by a global thermal nuclear war, where survivors struggle to adapt in a harsh, irradiated landscape filled with remnants of civilization. Societies have collapsed, resources are scarce, and new powers emerge from the ashes.
key_challenges: Dealing with radiation and finding safe shelter.
Resource scarcity leading to conflict between survivor factions.
Navigating the remnants of technology and potential rogue AI systems.
